The SSM 30 g has the potential to be a successful substitute, without the need for a healthcare professional, for administering intravenous, intramuscular, or oral opioids to treat intense acute pain.

In the context of managing intense acute pain, the SSM 30 g could be a viable and noninvasive option that users can rely on, avoiding the requirement for healthcare professionals to administer intravenous, intramuscular, or oral opioids.
